item.title: Goldie add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Only that day dawns to which we are awake. There is more day to dawn. The sun is but a morning star." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Mark Hoppus
item.description: "the past is only the future with the lights on." -- Mark Hoppus

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If I were not a physicist, I would probably be a musician. I often think in music. I live my daydreams in music. I see my life in terms of music." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description:
"<b>The preachers and lecturers deal with men of straw, as they are men of straw themselves</b>. Why, a free-spoken man, of sound lungs, cannot draw a long breath without causing your rotten institutions to come toppling down by the vacuum he makes. Your church is a baby-house made of blocks, and so of the state.
...The church, the state, the school, the magazine, think they are liberal and free! It is the freedom of a prison-yard." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Information is not knowledge. Knowledge is not wisdom. Wisdom is not truth. Truth is not beauty. Beauty is not love. Love is not music. Music is THE BEST." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Music makes one feel so romantic - at least it always gets on one's nerves - which is the same thing nowadays." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Les Baxter
item.description: "Any good music must be an innovation. " -- Les Baxter

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Modest Mouse
item.description: "Music is to the soul what words are to the mind." -- Modest Mouse

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Robert Fripp
item.description: "Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence." -- Robert Fripp

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Ludwig van Beethoven
item.description: "Music is ... A higher revelation than all Wisdom & Philosophy" -- Ludwig van Beethoven

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Substitute 'damn' every time you're inclined to write 'very;' your editor will delete it and the writing will be just as it should be." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "How vain it is to sit down to write when you have not stood up to live." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "History will be kind to me for I intend to write it." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You must stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "We write to taste life twice, in the moment and in retrospect." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "When I write, I feel like an armless, legless man with a crayon in his mouth." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Jules Renard
item.description: "Writing is a way of talking without being interrupted." -- Jules Renard

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "There are books of which the backs and covers are by far the best parts." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Isabel Allende
item.description: "Write what should not be forgotten." -- Isabel Allende

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "You can fix anything but a blank page." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Goldie add a quote by A.A. Milne
Goldie add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit." -- Aristotle

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Homer
item.description: "How prone to doubt, how cautious are the wise!" -- Homer

item.title: Goldie add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Goldie add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi
